q: the XL Center. UConn coach Jim Calhoun was in attendance and received an ovation when he was shown on the large video board above the court.`` I bet you he felt out place,'' Allen Iverson said. Just sitting there, he could relax. Allen Iverson had eight points, six rebounds and four assists. He made his only field goal in the opening seconds of the third quarter and set up Kevin Garnett for a jumper that gave Boston its first double-digit lead,
